casebody.data:
Prudential Insurance Company, Appellant, v. Peterson, Appellee.

[Cite as Prudential Ins. Co. v. Peterson (1989), 43 Ohio St. 3d 174.]

(No. 88-756 Submitted April 4, 1989 Decided June 14, 1989.) *175Michael R. Eckhart, for appellant. Thomas A. Thornburgh, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on authority of Cincinnati Bell Tel. Co. v. Straley (1988), 40 Ohio St. 3d 372, 533 N.E. 2d 764.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
